ChestBelt Android application

The ChestBelt android application enables to collect and visualize data from SINTEF chest belts. The application use SensApp android to store data.

Download

  • Latest release build: available on the Google Play.
  • Latest snapshot build: intall the chestbeltdroid-main-X.X-SNAPSHOT-aligned.apk file.

Bugs and Feature requests

Please see and use the issue tracker at: https://github.com/SINTEF-9012/chestbelt-android/issues
